The Profile

I am a PhD Candidate in Political Science at the University of BrasÃ­lia (UnB), a Data Scientist, and a Specialist in Public Controllership and Public Economics & Finance.

My career bridges the gap between academic rigor and data-driven analysis. I work at the intersection of political institutions and data engineering, transforming complex government datasets into strategic intelligence.

I hold superior-level proficiency certifications in French (DALF C2) and Spanish (DELE C2), am fluent in English, and have working knowledge of Italian and German.

Technical Skills & Tools

My toolkit combines computational techniques, statistical methods, and a solid command of Administrative and Constitutional Law for deep state analysis.

ğŸ’» Data Science & Statistics

  • Government Audit: Application of Administrative Law for compliance techniques and external control in Public Administration.

Selected Works (Laboratory)
